name: Yael Chaver

publications.text: What Must Be Forgotten: The Survival of Yiddish in Zionist Palestine
“The End of Language Wanderings? Yiddish in David Grossman’s Ayen Erekh: Ahava  and Aharon Megged’s Foiglman,” Journal of Jewish Identities, Issue 7, No. 1, January 2014, 143-162.
